```{r}
# fill a matrix with random zeros
r <- 25
c <- 10
m0 <- matrix(0, r, c)
apply(m0, c(1,2), function(x) sample(c(0,1),1)) 
```



```{r}
# fill an array with random zeros and ones
r <- 10
c <- 10
s <- 3
a0 <- array(0, dim = c(r, c, s))
apply(a0, c(1,2,3), function(x) sample(c(0,1),1))
```
